channel.title: Telling it Straight
channel.itunes:author: peterbowler@timetomarket
channel.itunes:subtitle: Telling it Straight is a series of presentation and public speaking skills tips and techniques
channel.itunes:summary: Telling it Straight uncovers presentation and public speaking tips, techniques and best practice for any presenter wanting to give their presenting skills a boost.
